attributes.action: Stop expecting people who receive DLA to pay for everything with it !
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
DLA is not enough for people to use it to pay for all their needs.  It is intended for helping people cope with their medical needs, and does not include the extra cost of fuel for people with "chronic" illnesses !
People in receipt of DLA should,like pensioners, be entitled to the Winter Fuel Allowance !
Like pensioners, in some cases, their life depends on being able to stay warm and comfortable in their own home.
It is not just Cancer patients that are affected by this injustice. All Chronically ill people need this help !
